name: Fogbeam Labs
tag_list: open-source, enterprise, enterprise-social-network, enterprise-2-0, knowledge-management, business-process-management
overview:
Fogbeam Labs is a provide of Open Source Enterprise Software, working at the intersection of Collaboration / Groupware, Social Networking, Knowledge Management and Business Process Management.r

Our initial product offerings could be seen as similar to offerings from outfits like Jive Software, Yammer, etc. Where we are going in a slightly different direction is with out focus on deep integration into value creating business processes and workflows. We are bringing the “social” aspect of an Enterprise Social Network and marrying it to Business Process Management, Business Process Monitoring and process improvement.

All of our products are true Open Source projects, developed in the open, released under an OSI approved license (currently everything is ASLv2) and developed in collaboration with the larger F/OSS community. Our licensing model is similar to that of Red Hat and is subscription based.
